about-us.title: Agora is a platform for participating in disputes and events.
about-us.list-creator:
• 1. Go to the event creation page (+) and fill in the necessary information, including the deadline for ticket purchases and the event end date.
  • 2. After the event is over, determine the winning option within 24 hours. If this does not happen, the event will be canceled.
  • 3. After determining the winner, you will receive 3.5% of the total event volume, and Agora platform will receive 1.5%.
  • Remember that you are responsible for fairly determining the winner and timely completing the event.
about-us.footer: Good luck participating and creating events on the Agora platform!
about-us.list-buyer:
• 1. Connect your wallet.
  • 2. Browse available events and choose the one you want to participate in.
  • 3. Buy ticket(s) for the event you are interested in, specifying the number of tickets and selecting the appropriate option. The cost of one ticket is equal to 1 TON.
  • 4. Wait for the event creator to determine the winner. If you have chosen the winning option, you can exchange it for a share of the winnings according to the number of your tickets.
  • If the creator does not determine the winner within 24 hours after the event ends, you can return your tickets and get your funds back.
about-us.warning: This project is not a gambling game or a bookmaker's office. The purpose of this platform is to provide an opportunity to participate in various discussions and events, as well as to assess and select specific events. We do not support, encourage, or conduct gambling games or bets on sporting events. Users should use this platform exclusively for participating in events and exchanging opinions.
